course_content.core: Components of the programme The programme is semester-based and covers understanding of the principles in a wide range of Biomedical Disciplines, including Anatomy, Physiology, Biochemistry, Genetics, Cell and Molecular Biology, Biophysics, Bioinformatics, Immunology, Microbiology, Parasitology, Pathology, Pharmacology, Bacteriology, Virology & Mycology, Biostatistics, Forensic Science, Behavioural Science, Bioinstrumentation, Bioethics, Bioregulation and Biosafety, Biomedical Diagnostics, Transfusion Science and Blood Banking, Public Health Research Project and Industrial Training. Assessment Formative and summative assessments including research projects and industrial training.
